name: Farm Together
description: Grow your own farm all by yourself, or cooperate with your friends in this unique, relaxing farming experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad core processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 960 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended
